page.title: 15BRYN-STREET STUDY CONTD.
page.content:
{WHERE LIVED BEFORE BRYN:}FOR HOW LONG: 10 ALWAYS IN BRYN ------- 01 FROM CWMAVON FOR 8 YEARS 01 FROM PORT TALBOT FOR 7 YEARS 01 FROM GLYNCORRWG FOR 40 YEARS 01 FROM CARDIFF FOR 23 YEARS 01 FROM LONDON FOR 35 YEARS 01 FROM HAY-ON-WYE FOR 09 YEARS
{HOUSE OWNERSHIP: 12 RENTING FROM COUNCIL 06 BUYING FROM COUNCIL 02 OWNED FOR 2 YEARS 04 OWNED FOR 4 YEARS {HOUSE IMPROVEMENTS:} 12 KITCHEN EXTENSIONS * 07 CENTRAL HEATING 02 STONE CLADDING 03 DOUBLE GLAZING 14 INDOOR TOILETS * 02 ROOM EXTENSIONS * COUNCIL GRANTS(*)
